de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Class AbstractPrimitiveDistanceFunction<O,D extends Distance<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractPrimitiveDistanceFunction<O,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - the type of objects to compute the distances in between
    D - the type of Distance used
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceFunction<O,D>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O,D>, Parameterizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDimensionsSelectingDoubleDistanceFunction, AbstractVectorDoubleDistanceFunction, FooKernelFunction, LevenshteinDistanceFunction, NormalizedLevenshteinDistanceFunction, PolynomialKernelFunction, SparseLPNormDistanceFunction

    public abstract class AbstractPrimitiveDistanceFunction<O,D extends Distance<D>>
extends Object
implements PrimitiveDistanceFunction<O,D>
    AbstractDistanceFunction provides some methods valid for any extending class.
